amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds by the Federal Aviation Administration to implement its preferred alternative of the New York/New Jersey/Philadelphia Airspace Redesign project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Federal Aviation Administration to implement its preferred alternative of the New York/New Jersey/ Philadelphia Airspace Redesign project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 65 - 360 (Roll no. 704).
